pageTitle: Crime Offenses | Student Life | LeTourneau University
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {881=The Campus Safety Security Survey statistics are compiled, by Federal law, for the most recent completed calendar year. The statistics are gathered in September of each year for the completed prior year. This means that as of November 24, 2014, the reports reflect statistics for calendar years 2011, 2012 and 2013.}
textBeforeTable: Telephone:  (902) 233-4440 Email:  UniversityPolice@letu.edu Address:  University Police Department PO Box 7001 Longview, TX 75607 We hope this information is useful to you as you consider LeTourneau University as your community in which to study, live or work. If you have questions concerning information not contained in this report you may contact the office of the Chief of Police, at: The Campus Safety Security Survey statistics are compiled, by Federal law, for the most recent completed calendar year. The statistics are gathered in September of each year for the completed prior year. This means that as of November 24, 2014, the reports reflect statistics for calendar years 2011, 2012 and 2013.
